def_cn: （供公众咨询或提供信息用的）热线
def_en: A hotline is a telephone line that the public can use to contact an organization about a particular subject. Hotlines allow people to obtain information from an organization or to give the organization information.

def_cn: （两国政府首脑间的）热线，直通电话
def_en: A hotline is a special, direct telephone line between the heads of government in different countries.
